cast.name: 艾利卡·露斯特 Erika Lust

this_title: Sex in Lockdown: Keep Shagging and Carry On
introduction: A mix of faces from across the nation join Anna Richardson as she gets to grips with all things love, sex and romance, delving into the ways sex in Britain has altered since its people have been ordered to stay indoors. She also reveals the results of a specially commissioned survey to find out exactly what the Great British Public have been getting up to during lockdown.
chinese_title: Sex in Lockdown: Keep Shagging and Carry On
